money_sign.money_sign_desc:
You prefer to maintain an air of mystery by being discreet about your intentions, and taking measured actions. You’re highly inquisitive and aren’t afraid to venture into the unknown if the reward could prove worth it. This, combined with your strategic thought process, helps you achieve solid results. Your high levels of ambition can trigger restlessness, but also motivate you to seek prospects beyond the ordinary.

 You exercise autonomy while making decisions, even as you closely monitor your competitor’s movements to scout for rewarding opportunities. When a lucrative proposition is on the table, your decisions are swift and deliberate, regardless of what the outcome may be.

money_sign_behavioural_bias.title: Overconfidence Bias
money_sign_behavioural_bias.desc: You may, at times, exhibit unwarranted faith in your own abilities, judgements and knowledge levels, which can manifest as attributing success to your skills and failures to external factors. This bias might convince you to underestimate risks and overestimate returns, which would lead to a highly concentrated portfolio.

gen_profile.gen_profile_desc: Skilled professional with a steady income and cautious outlook, who wants to improve the standard of living.
life_stage_desc: Focusing on building a strong foundation

emergency_funds.title: Emergency Funds
emergency_funds.comment: Having an adequate liquidity buffer is an excellent downside protection strategy against situations like job loss, financial emergencies, etc.

health_insurance.title: Health Insurance
health_insurance.comment: Lack of adequate health insurance coverage exposes the family to avoidable financial and emotional strain in the event of an emergency.

life_insurance.title: Life Insurance
life_insurance.comment: Inadequate life cover can be damaging for dependants if the policy owner leaves behind a large amount of liabilities, with only a few assets.

good_liabilities_to_total_assets.title: Good Liabilities-to-Total Assets
good_liabilities_to_total_assets.comment: Going overboard with liabilities defeats the purpose of taking them on, especially if returns on your asset portfolio are low.

bad_liabilities_to_total_assets.title: Bad Liabilities-to-Total Assets
bad_liabilities_to_total_assets.comment: High levels of expensive debt translate to paying more interest than is necessary.

expense_to_income.title: Expense-to-Income
expense_to_income.comment: Keeping expenses under control reduces the likelihood of encountering a cash flow problem.

good_liabilities_linked_emi_to_income.title: Good Liability Linked EMI-to-Income
good_liabilities_linked_emi_to_income.comment: Having only a few good EMIs (or none) may result in excessive interest payments, which is undesirable unless there are higher-return investment opportunities available.

bad_liabilities_linked_emi_to_income.title: Bad Liability Linked EMI-to-Income
bad_liabilities_linked_emi_to_income.comment: It is critical to manage bad debt repayment well in order to avoid paying too much interest on high-cost liabilities.

investments_to_income.title: Investments-to-Income
investments_to_income.comment: Inconsistent savings, owing to an inability to delay gratification, leave you financially vulnerable.

equity.title: Equity
equity.comment: Well-balanced equity investment strategy has the potential to generate higher returns with the right risk tolerance.

real_estate.title: Real Estate
real_estate.comment: A low real estate allocation misses out on a valuable way to diversify portfolio and generate consistent returns over time.

passive_income_assets.title: Passive Income Assets
passive_income_assets.comment: Maintaining the right passive income asset allocation can help diversify a portfolio, providing a steady stream of income and reducing overall investment risk.

debt.title: Debt
debt.comment: Maintaining an adequate debt allocation in the portfolio could reduce volatility and serve as a fallback mechanism during times of economic uncertainty.

alternative_investments.title: Alternative Investments
alternative_investments.comment: Allocating some portion of the portfolio to alternative products provides diversification benefits.

credit_score_analysis.commentary: Well Done. You have an excellent credit score which shows you will be regarded as a responsible credit seeker.

comments: Your EMI Burden Ratio (EMI by gross monthly income) is appropriate at 3%.

comments1: *1 Finance score ranges from 0-100. The table above displays scores of the Direct-Growth plans of the respective schemes.
**Excess annual commissions are estimates derived from the difference between expense ratios of regular and direct plans, and current value.
comments2: 31% of your MF investments (by value) are in Regular plans. As a result, you might pay0.26% of your investment value in excess commissions every year. By switching to direct plans you can enhance your returns by that much. Explore our MF commission analyser to estimate excess commissions paid by you till date.

27% of your equity MFs (by value) are high quality. Consider removing low/medium quality funds from your portfolio. Our equity MF featured list is available at the end of this report, and an evaluation of all equity MFs is available on our MF scoring and ranking page.

fwp.title: Emergency Planning
desc: You've wisely thought about emergency planning. Great going with that long-term vision.
Not buying an adequate health cover for yourself exposes you and your loved ones to emotional strain. Consider purchasing more cover.

fwp.title: Expense and Liability Management
desc: Your good liabilities to total assets ratio is relatively high. Consider reducing your good liabilities by a fraction to start with.
Your bad liabilities to total assets ratio is high. Consider using low-yielding assets to pay off your bad liabilities.

fwp.title: Asset Allocation
desc: You've done a good job building passive income. Minimal efforts like these go a long way.
Well done with your debt allocation. It helps reduce portfolio volatility and acts as a fallback mechanism in times of emergency.

credit_card.eligibility: Age of 21-60 years
credit_card.best_suited_for: Grocery, Fuel, Food and Dining, Shopping, Entertainment, Travel
strength: Accelerated RPs on base accrual rate of 1% on household and lifestyle benefits: 10x or 5x reward points on online and offline purchases; and additional 5% cashback for travel, food & dining, grocery, technology & electronics, and clothing & fashion
16 complimentary domestic and international airport lounge access at participating lounges
weakness: No RPs on fuel transactions
No air accident cover, travel insurance or emergency hospitalisation cover on domestic/international travel
Interest rate charge of 43.08% per annum

credit_card.eligibility: Age of 21-65 years and salary of Rs. 12 LPA or annual ITR filed for Rs. 12 Lakhs
credit_card.best_suited_for: Grocery, Fuel, Food and Dining, Shopping, Entertainment
strength: Accelerated NeuCoins rewards on base accrual rate of 1.5% on household and lifestyle benefits: groceries (10% on BigBasket); food and dining (10% on Qmin); clothing and fashion (10% on Tata CLiQ, Westside, Tanishq, Titan); and entertainment (10% on TATA play)
8 domestic and 4 international complimentary airport lounge access per year at participating lounges
weakness: No NeuCoins on fuel transactions
Interest rate charge of 41.88% per annum

credit_card.eligibility: Age above 18 years
credit_card.best_suited_for: Fuel
strength: Accelerated RPs on base accrual rate of 1% on fuel (25x on fuel purchases at BPCL outlets in India)
4 complimentary domestic airport lounge access per year at participating lounges
weakness: Interest rate charge of 42% per annum

credit_card.eligibility: Age of 21-65 years and salary of Rs. 8.4 LPA or annual ITR filed for Rs. 8.4 Lakhs
credit_card.best_suited_for: Travel
strength: Accelerated RPs on base accrual rate of 2.7% on lifestyle benefits: travel and vacation (5x on flights, 10x on hotels, 3x on trains, 5x on buses)
8 complimentary domestic and international airport lounge access per year at participating lounges
Comprehensive insurance including air accidental cover (Rs. 1 crore), overseas hospitalisation (Rs. 25 lakhs) and travel insurance for baggage & document loss/delay (Rs. 1 lakh)
weakness: No complimentary golf rounds and lessons
Annual fee waiver on spending more than Rs. 3 lakhs in the preceding year

credit_card.eligibility: Age of 18-70 years and salary of Rs. 18 LPA or annual ITR filed for Rs.18 lakhs
credit_card.best_suited_for: Food and Dining, Shopping, Entertainment
strength: Accelerated EDGE RPs on base accrual rate of 6% on lifestyle benefits: clothing and fashion (10x on Pantaloons, 5x on Nyka/Tata CLiQ); technology and electronics (5x on Croma); food and dining (40% off on Easydiner and 5x on Swiggy/Zomato); and entertainment (buy one movie/non-movie ticket and get upto Rs.500 off on second ticket on BookMyShow)
Unlimited domestic and international airport lounge access at participating lounges
weakness: No air accident cover or emergency hospitalisation cover on domestic/international travel
Interest rate charge of 42.58% per annum

credit_card.eligibility: Age of 21-60 years and salary of Rs. 21 LPA or annual ITR filed for Rs. 21 Lakhs
credit_card.best_suited_for: Grocery, Food and Dining, Shopping, Entertainment, Travel, Luxury
strength: Accelerated RPs on base accrual rate of 3.3% on household and lifestyle benefits: groceries (3x on Flipkart); food & dining (2x on weekend dining and 3x on Swiggy/Zomato); entertainment (3x on BookMyShow); clothing and fashion (3x on Amazon, Flipkart, Pantaloons, Myntra, Tata CLiQ); and travel and vacations (5x on flights, 10x on hotels, 3x on trains, 5x on buses)
6 complimentary golf games per quarter across domestic/international courses
Unlimited domestic and international airport lounge access at participating lounges
weakness: No complimentary golf lessons

credit_card.eligibility: Age of 18-70 years
credit_card.best_suited_for: Grocery, Food and Dining, Shopping, Entertainment, Travel, Luxury
strength: Accelerated RPs on base accrual rate of 3.3% on household and lifestyle benefits: groceries (5x on Flipkart);  food & dining (5x on Swiggy/Zomato, additional 15% off via Swiggy Dineout); entertainment (5x on BookMyShow); clothing & fashion (5x on Amazon, Flipkart, Pantaloons, Myntra, Tata CLiQ); and technology & electronics (5x on Imagine store, Amazon, Flipkart)
Unlimited complimentary golf rounds and coaching across India
Unlimited domestic and international airport lounge access at participating lounges
weakness: Invite-only credit card
No travel insurance cover

money_sign.money_sign_desc:
You prefer to maintain an air of mystery by being discreet about your intentions, and taking measured actions. You’re highly inquisitive and aren’t afraid to venture into the unknown if the reward could prove worth it. This, combined with your strategic thought process, helps you achieve solid results. Your high levels of ambition can trigger restlessness, but also motivate you to seek prospects beyond the ordinary.

 You exercise autonomy while making decisions, even as you closely monitor your competitor’s movements to scout for rewarding opportunities. When a lucrative proposition is on the table, your decisions are swift and deliberate, regardless of what the outcome may be.

money_sign_behavioural_bias.title: Overconfidence Bias
money_sign_behavioural_bias.desc: You may, at times, exhibit unwarranted faith in your own abilities, judgements and knowledge levels, which can manifest as attributing success to your skills and failures to external factors. This bias might convince you to underestimate risks and overestimate returns, which would lead to a highly concentrated portfolio.

gen_profile.gen_profile_desc: Skilled professional with a steady income and cautious outlook, who wants to improve the standard of living.
life_stage_desc: Focusing on building a strong foundation

emergency_funds.title: Emergency Funds
emergency_funds.comment: Having an adequate liquidity buffer is an excellent downside protection strategy against situations like job loss, financial emergencies, etc.

health_insurance.title: Health Insurance
health_insurance.comment: Lack of adequate health insurance coverage exposes the family to avoidable financial and emotional strain in the event of an emergency.

life_insurance.title: Life Insurance
life_insurance.comment: Inadequate life cover can be damaging for dependants if the policy owner leaves behind a large amount of liabilities, with only a few assets.

good_liabilities_to_total_assets.title: Good Liabilities-to-Total Assets
good_liabilities_to_total_assets.comment: Going overboard with liabilities defeats the purpose of taking them on, especially if returns on your asset portfolio are low.

bad_liabilities_to_total_assets.title: Bad Liabilities-to-Total Assets
bad_liabilities_to_total_assets.comment: High levels of expensive debt translate to paying more interest than is necessary.

expense_to_income.title: Expense-to-Income
expense_to_income.comment: Keeping expenses under control reduces the likelihood of encountering a cash flow problem.

good_liabilities_linked_emi_to_income.title: Good Liability Linked EMI-to-Income
good_liabilities_linked_emi_to_income.comment: Having only a few good EMIs (or none) may result in excessive interest payments, which is undesirable unless there are higher-return investment opportunities available.

bad_liabilities_linked_emi_to_income.title: Bad Liability Linked EMI-to-Income
bad_liabilities_linked_emi_to_income.comment: It is critical to manage bad debt repayment well in order to avoid paying too much interest on high-cost liabilities.

investments_to_income.title: Investments-to-Income
investments_to_income.comment: Inconsistent savings, owing to an inability to delay gratification, leave you financially vulnerable.

equity.title: Equity
equity.comment: Well-balanced equity investment strategy has the potential to generate higher returns with the right risk tolerance.

real_estate.title: Real Estate
real_estate.comment: A low real estate allocation misses out on a valuable way to diversify portfolio and generate consistent returns over time.

passive_income_assets.title: Passive Income Assets
passive_income_assets.comment: Maintaining the right passive income asset allocation can help diversify a portfolio, providing a steady stream of income and reducing overall investment risk.

debt.title: Debt
debt.comment: Maintaining an adequate debt allocation in the portfolio could reduce volatility and serve as a fallback mechanism during times of economic uncertainty.

alternative_investments.title: Alternative Investments
alternative_investments.comment: Allocating some portion of the portfolio to alternative products provides diversification benefits.

credit_score_analysis.commentary: Well Done. You have an excellent credit score which shows you will be regarded as a responsible credit seeker.

comments: Your EMI Burden Ratio (EMI by gross monthly income) is appropriate at 3%.

comments1: *1 Finance score ranges from 0-100. The table above displays scores of the Direct-Growth plans of the respective schemes.
**Excess annual commissions are estimates derived from the difference between expense ratios of regular and direct plans, and current value.
comments2: 31% of your MF investments (by value) are in Regular plans. As a result, you might pay0.26% of your investment value in excess commissions every year. By switching to direct plans you can enhance your returns by that much. Explore our MF commission analyser to estimate excess commissions paid by you till date.

27% of your equity MFs (by value) are high quality. Consider removing low/medium quality funds from your portfolio. Our equity MF featured list is available at the end of this report, and an evaluation of all equity MFs is available on our MF scoring and ranking page.

fwp.title: Emergency Planning
desc: You've wisely thought about emergency planning. Great going with that long-term vision.
Not buying an adequate health cover for yourself exposes you and your loved ones to emotional strain. Consider purchasing more cover.

fwp.title: Expense and Liability Management
desc: Your good liabilities to total assets ratio is relatively high. Consider reducing your good liabilities by a fraction to start with.
Your bad liabilities to total assets ratio is high. Consider using low-yielding assets to pay off your bad liabilities.

fwp.title: Asset Allocation
desc: You've done a good job building passive income. Minimal efforts like these go a long way.
Well done with your debt allocation. It helps reduce portfolio volatility and acts as a fallback mechanism in times of emergency.

comments.title: Expense and Liability Management
desc: ythgh

comments.title: Emergency Planning
desc: please

weakness: High expense ratio of 0.21% versus category average of 0.16%.

strength: Track record of steady performance, with a CAGR of 6.75% since inception.
Competitive YTM of 6.86% as compared to category average of 6.81%.
Features a diversified portfolio of high-quality bond issues.
weakness: Slightly higher expense ratio of 0.20% versus category average of 0.16%.

short_term.name: ICICI Pru Short Term Fund
strength: Robust performance record, with a CAGR of 8.42% since inception.

Maintains a diverse selection of high-quality bond issues.
weakness: High expense ratio of 0.39% versus category average of 0.35%.

short_term.name: HDFC Short Term Debt Fund
